events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on a rainy evening, resulting in damage to the front bumper and headlight of their car.
The claim was reviewed and appropriately categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer's car in the collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the claim and assist the customer through the entire process smoothly.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now in process.
To proceed, the customer was asked to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and proof of insurance coverage.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the collision damage and the official police report.
The claims department initiated a thorough investigation to verify the circumstances of the accident and the extent of the damages to the vehicle.
The investigation confirmed the validity of the claim and the estimated repair costs for the vehicle damages were documented.
An initial settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair expenses and temporary car rental fees due to the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the support provided by the assigned agent throughout the process.
Following customer agreement, the claim was formally approved and authorized for payout based on the proposed settlement.
Payment for the approved claim was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover all repair and associated costs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and customer acknowledgment of claim resolution.
All documents and records related to the claim were securely archived to maintain proper insurance case history and compliance.
